name: Rich Italian Sausage and Potato Soup
author: MARBALET
summary: This soup combines unique flavors to form a rich, delicious soup. Your taste buds will be overjoyed.  Instead of bouillon cube you can substitute I ounce chicken broth.
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Place sausage links on a sheet pan and bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until done
Cut each link in half lengthwise, and then into 1/2 inch slices
In a 4 quart saucepan over medium heat, saute the onions and the pancetta for 10 minutes, or until onions are almost clear
Add the garlic and saute for one more minute
Add the chicken base OR bouillon, water and potatoes and bring to a simmer for 15 minutes
Add the kale, cream and reserved sausage, simmer for 5 more minutes and serve
